thread.title: 2015-16 Bruins: Herald staff picks
thread.title_full: 2015-16 Bruins: Herald staff picks | Boston Herald

author: Herald Staff
title: 2015-16 Bruins: Herald staff picks
text:
STEVE CONROY
BRUINS FINISH
Atlantic Division: Third
Playoffs: Yes. Eighth spot in East.
MVP: Tuukka Rask
Biggest surprise: Colin Miller. He’s not the same player as Johnny Boychuk — better skater, not as physical — but he’ll bring a rocket shot from the right side like Boychuk did.
NHL FINISH
Eastern Conference: Capitals
Western Conference: Kings
Stanley Cup: Kings
STEPHEN HARRIS
BRUINS FINISH
Atlantic Division: Fourth
Playoffs: Yes. Eighth spot in East.
MVP: Tuukka Rask
Biggest surprise: Ryan Spooner. With a pair of big, solid wingers on his flanks, and regularly skating against opponent’s No. 3 defense pairs, the fast and talented Spooner should pile up 60 points in his first full NHL campaign.
NHL FINISH
Eastern Conference: Capitals
Western Conference: Blackhawks
Stanley Cup: Blackhawks
